sql.name: 获取所有的IP列表
sql.content: SELECT a.id, a.ip, a.gateway, a.net_mask, a.project_id, a.status, a.net_name, a.create_date, b.project_name FROM t_ip_info a LEFT JOIN t_project b ON a.project_id = b.id WHERE 1 = 1 [ AND instr(a.ip,':ip') > 0 ]

sql.name: 获取用户可用的IP列表
sql.content: SELECT a.id, a.ip, a.gateway, a.net_mask, a.project_id, a.status, a.net_name, a.create_date,a.processor_id, b.project_name FROM t_ip_info a LEFT JOIN t_project b ON a.project_id = b.id WHERE a.status = 'N' [ and a.project_id = ':projectId' ] UNION SELECT a.id, a.ip, a.gateway, a.net_mask, a.project_id, a.status, a.net_name, a.create_date,a.processor_id, b.project_name FROM t_ip_info a LEFT JOIN t_project b ON a.project_id = b.id WHERE a.status IN ('Y','L','Q') and mark_user = ':userId' [ and a.project_id = ':projectId' ]

sql.name: 根据id获取IP
sql.content: SELECT a.id, a.ip, a.gateway, a.net_mask, a.project_id, a.status, a.net_name, a.create_date, b.id as project_id FROM t_ip_info a LEFT JOIN t_project b ON a.project_id = b.id WHERE a.id = ':id'

sql.name: 添加IP
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_ip_info(id, ip, gateway, net_mask, project_id, status, net_name, create_date) VALUES(':id', ':ip', ':gateway', ':netMask', ':projectId', ':status', ':netName', ':createDate')

sql.name: 修改IP
sql.content: UPDATE t_ip_info set ip=':ip', gateway=':gateway', net_mask=':netMask', project_id=':projectId', net_name=':netName' WHERE id = ':id'

sql.name: 更新IP状态
sql.content: UPDATE t_ip_info SET status = ':status', mark_user=':markUser' WHERE id = ':id'

sql.name: 更新IP对应的处理器ID
sql.content: UPDATE t_ip_info SET processor_id = ':processorId' WHERE id = ':id'

sql.name: 检查IP是否在库中和标记
sql.content: SELECT id FROM t_ip_info WHERE ip = ':ip' AND project_id = ':projectId' AND status = 'Y' AND mark_user = ':markUser' AND ( processor_id is null OR processor_id = '' )

sql.name: 检查IP是否有其他处理器使用
sql.content: SELECT id, processor_number FROM t_ip_info WHERE ip = ':ip' AND project_id = ':projectId' AND status = 'Y' AND mark_user = ':markUser' AND length(processor_id) > 0
